well what makes this crisis

facing Australia's authorities the

what happened on New Year's Eve
really came at the worst possible time
this is a very popular tourist

that's why the evacuation is so chaotic
and complicated there are so many people
in the fire zone some don't want to

can't because of various road closures
adding to this sense of unease and
unpredictability is the fact that there
are shortages of food fuel and water and
also internet and phone services have
gone down so that's adding to this great
sense of unease as thousands of people
continue to pour out of that region and
elsewhere fill extraordinary stories of
personal survival we're hearing it left
right and center and I think when you
add up all the emotions that have been
swirling around in this crisis there has

fear unpredictability and also great
resilience and strength and also a great
deal of good fortune as well we've seen

those flames others have literally had
to drive their cars into the water of
lakes and other people have gone into

flames so these extraordinary stories
there are many of them and the
expectation is sadly that we'll be
